about_the_game:
Join the early testing phase of our innovative open world voxel game and play a crucial role in cocreating a universe teeming with potential. Craft a character that reflects your style, race around the city in high-octane vehicles, manage your underground empire or team up with friends for daring operations and thrilling heists!


- Personalize Your Unique Character: Exhibit Your Extraordinary style!

Freely mold your identity with our indepth character customization options. Whether it's a classic jacket, a signature hairstyle, or dazzling bling; choose the details that make you stand out from the crowd. Be the most genuine you!


- Explore a vast Open World: Cruise in custom vehicles, roam around Golden Bay

Explore endless possibilities in a gigantic, living and breathing open world. From its towering skyscrapers to charming suburbs, view the city of Golden Bay in an everchanging light with dynamic day/night and weather cycles.


- Manage Your Underground Empire: Run the city from the shadows!

Find your place in the underworld, or resist it! Band together with friends to build your criminal enterprise from the ground up, tackling threats from rival gangs and security forces. Even if the police prove only a minor hindrance, there's always someone else plotting to take your crown.


- New Battle Experience: Bring the heat to the streets!

Fight alongside your friends or gun them down to prove who rules the streets. Every move in this volatile neighbourhood matters - a single false step is all it takes to seal your fate. Feel the intensity with realistic firearms and ordinance!


- Director Mode: The World Is Yours!
Direct your own movie scenes in FREE LIFE‘s one-of-a-kind Director Mode! Craft sets, freely place game props, direct NPCs to perform actions according to your vision. Bring to life the stories that only you can tell!

This is all just the tip of the iceberg for what FREE LIFE can become. Development is ongoing as we prepare to meet the expectations of our community. We look forward to meeting you and turning this blank canvas of a game into a vibrant masterpiece - together. Thank you for your interest and support! Join us in FREE LIFE and leave your mark in our shared virtual world.

content_descriptors.notes: Freelife includes mature content with violence and firearm use in a fictional urban setting. It's meant for a mature audience, and we advise player discretion. No explicit sexual content is present.

name: FREELIFE

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or 11
  • Processor: 3 GHz Dual-Core or better with AVX2
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Recent integrated graphics or dedicated GPU, at least 1GB VRAM and support for SM5
  • DirectX: Version 11
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or 11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5000 Series CPU or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1070 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
